title: Rep. Ro Khanna (D-CA), Dignity in a Digital Age: Making Tech Work for All of Us
description:
Congressman Ro Khanna (D-CA) looks at the digital divide in America and offers his suggestions on how to close the gap.  He's interviewed by founder and editor in chief of the Markup, Julia Angwin. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
